website_summaries.verdict: Laser measure from a trusted manufacturer that offers extremely accurate long distance measurements.
pros: Offers both water and debris resistance
Accurate to within 1/16 of an inch
cons: Price point sits a bit higher than other options

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt Laser Measuring tool works well
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Decent brightness on the laser, I haven’t tested it outdoors yet. I thought it arrived DOA but I think it was the batteries it came with. It required not cheap batteries to measure correctly or else I would receive error “INFO 401”. Now that I have it working, it measures larger by 1/16”-1/8” from 12”-72”. I can’t find anyway to manually calibrate it. It feels very sturdy and light. **UPDATE** I’ve owned this for a few months now. Original was DOA. Laser works great outside (San Diego) but is usually 3/32” larger, or right on with measurements. I can’t trust it for small accurate projects.
customer_reviews.author: Jab21

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth feature is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This this is amazing and makes my job sooo much easier! The Bluetooth feature is beyond amazing! It’s so simple to take a picture of your project and mark up the measurements!! I wish I would have bought this thing years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Never leave home without it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is spot on! To the 1/16. I trim houses and the measurements have to be exact or lve wasted time. This thing is awesome and you can trust it
customer_reviews.author: Toolman101476

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt but not the quality you would expect
customer_reviews.text: Came with empty batteries. Makes a lot of trouble, didnt send it back because it was already an replacement for a defective one. Not so happy...
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: No more holding one end of the ruler
customer_reviews.text: From the wife of one home builder/handy man, buy this for him! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: smiley

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This worked for about two weeks and then just would not turn on at all. I changed the batteries multiple times but it never worked again. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The cheaper ones work better to me
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work in lighted areas at all you cant read the display screen
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great cat toy or measure tool
customer_reviews.text: Measured the kitchen for remodel. Then took the tape doing the same. Same down to the fraction. Brought the dimensions to the designer she said I took part of job away. My cats thought I had a laser toy while reading the instructions. Not an issue with it.
customer_reviews.author: Opa Craig

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt Laser Measurers are not necessarily built to last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Dewalt's DW03050 just over three years ago. It never left the home, was never dropped, and was seldom used... 20 or 30 times max. It's basically in new, mint condition physically. Two months outside of the 3 year warranty it died.... nothing lights up even with fresh batteries. I contacted Dewalt about a replacement or repair. Since I was just outside the 3 year period Dewalt stated that they would not help me. Now I have a $100 paper weight. My 5 dollar cat laser pointer has worked longer! Be careful about buying Dewalt Laser Measurers.....hopefully their newer models are built better!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: fragile
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because it was DEWALT, for office use. There are plenty of equally accurate laser measures available for 1/3 the cost, but we wanted something durable and we were willing to pay extra for something designed to take the wear and tear of a construction site. Unfortunately in its 2nd month of use this $99 unit fell 30" onto a linoleum floor and the screen broke. Now it's in the garbage because it was made in CHINA and clearly never intended for real life.
customer_reviews.author: fajah

product_meta.title: DEWALT Laser Measure Tool/Distance Meter, 100-Feet with Bluetooth (DW099S)
product_meta.description: The DEWALT DW099S 100 FT Bluetooth-Enabled Laser Distance Measurer allows you to measure distances of up to 100' quickly and easily. It can calculate area and volume as well as perform simple addition and subtraction functions. This tool is commonly used to capture linear measurements, help to calculate paint estimations, and flooring estimations. Measuring range of 100ft / 30M, with accuracy within 3/32 inches. Uses 3 AAA batteries, included. Backed by DEWALT's 3 year limited warranty. Includes: 1) Laser Distance Measurer.
feature_bullets: Calculate area and volume as well as perform simple addition and subtraction functions
CAPTURE linear measurements, calculate paint and flooring estimations
Laser Class 2/ output less than or equal 1 mw at 620 to 690 Nm
